title: Lawrence falls, goes from 'panicked' to winning TD
content: A "goofy" finish to Monday night's game saw Jaguars QB Trevor Lawrence stumble after taking a snap from the 1-yard line, get up, stumble again, then break a tackle before diving into the end zone for the winning touchdown against the Chiefs.

title: Dodgers spin wheel play into win, 2-0 NLDS lead
content: With a dominant effort from Blake Snell, a well-executed wheel play and one fortuitous scoop from Freddie Freeman for the final out, the Los Angeles Dodgers escaped with a 4-3 victory over the Philadelphia Phillies on Monday in Game 2 of the NLDS.

title: Miz, Chourio provide sparks as Brewers win again
content: Young Brewers flamethrower Jacob Misiorowski and star outfielder Jackson Chourio put on a show Monday night while helping Milwaukee to a 2-0 lead over the Cubs in the National League Division Series.

title: Gannon apologizes to Demercado for sideline spat
content: Arizona Cardinals coach Jonathan Gannon said he apologized to Emari Demercado after a heated sideline conversation following the RB's unforced fumble.

title: Chargers placing top RB Hampton (ankle) on IR
content: Chargers starting running back Omarion Hampton will be placed on injured reserve due to an ankle injury, coach Jim Harbaugh said Monday.

title: Sanchez now facing felony charge for altercation
content: Mark Sanchez is facing a felony battery charge over the altercation between the former NFL quarterback and a 69-year-old truck driver early Saturday in Indianapolis.

title: Flagg displays versatility in 'fun' preseason debut
content: Mavericks rookie Cooper Flagg displayed the full package in his preseason debut, finishing with 10 points, 6 rebounds, 3 assists and a block.

title: Bills benched WR Coleman for disciplinary reasons
content: Buffalo Bills wide receiver Keon Coleman was benched for the first offensive series of Sunday night's loss to the New England Patriots for "discipline," head coach Sean McDermott said Monday.

title: ❓LeBron's cryptic post drives Lakers ticket spike
content: After LeBron's "Second Decision" tease, prices for the Lakers' home finale vs. Jazz soared, per Vivid Seats.

title: Winners and losers of Connor McDavid's contract extension
content: No. 97 is sticking with the Oilers through 2027-28 -- with a wide range of downstream impacts around the NHL.

title: NFL Week 6 Power Rankings: 1-32 team poll, plus the biggest fantasy surprise from every roster
content: We stacked every NFL team ahead of Week 6. Which teams rose into or fell out of the top 10? Plus, we have fantasy surprises on each roster.

title: MLB playoff hot takes: From one pitch deciding October to the Jays averaging how many runs per game?!
content: What can we learn from a week of MLB postseason baseball? Enough to make our experts go all-in on their boldest predictions.

title: CFP Bubble Watch: Who's in, who's out, who has work to do in each league﻿
content: Putting the spotlight on select teams and questions around others as the early playoff picture takes shape.

title: Where Penn State, Texas go from here and other key developments in Week 6
content: How bleak are things for Penn State and Texas? What's next in the ACC and Big 12? Bill Connelly has answers.

title: Is Sidney Crosby wasting his final chapter in Pittsburgh? What Malkin and Letang -- and Crosby -- say about it
content: Crosby is still one of the best players in the NHL. But with the Penguins possibly rebuilding, could his future lie somewhere other than Pittsburgh?

title: 'Beyond repair': Napheesa Collier, Cathy Engelbert and a WNBA teetering on the brink
content: Amid the WNBA Finals, two of the most powerful people in the game are locked in a contentious battle -- for public opinion, power and money.

title: Why Giannis Antetokounmpo's future in Milwaukee is far from settled
content: In a transformative summer for the Bucks, the team had discussions about moving the two-time MVP to New York.

content: Closing championship windows, new front offices and wild-card teams all highlight early NBA trade preview.

content: Judge's stat line looks solid -- but his power has gone missing and the Yankees are on the brink of elimination. What gives?

title: How the John Elway-led Broncos of the mid-2010s grew an NFL general manager tree
content: The Broncos turned into a GM factory under Elway, as four current and two former GMs were in Denver under his Super Bowl-winning regime.

title: The 49ers are finding ways to win -- thanks to (receiver?) Christian McCaffrey
content: While the 49ers have not been productive on the ground, their running back has been producing through the air.

title: Men's Preseason Top 25: Who is No. 1? Plus risers and fallers in final month to tip
content: Does Purdue, Houston or Florida deserve the top spot? Find out in the last offseason edition of our rankings.

content: The reigning champ and runner-up are 1-2. Who rounds out the rest, and which transfer should you watch?

content: A closer look at the injury updates coming out of Week 5, and the top candidates to replace Omarion Hampton in the Chargers' backfield.

content: Key running backs and a rookie seized opportunities, but two of the most reliable stars didn't get the job done.

title: Fred VanVleet injury: Four things to know about its impact on Rockets, Durant
content: Our NBA insiders broke down the injury's impact on the team, its players and what Houston could do to bolster its lineup.

title: Is it time to worry about Mohamed Salah at Liverpool?
content: There is a lot of uncertainty around this new-look Liverpool side right now, but one thing we know for sure: if Salah doesn't play like himself soon, nothing else matters.

title: Miami dominance and a UCLA stunner: Recapping a chaotic Week 6
content: In Week 6, the Grim Reaper came for Penn State and Texas, but Miami proved itself against Florida State.

title: Should you bet on Miami QB Carson Beck for the Heisman?
content: As the odds shift for the Heisman Trophy and national championship, Pamela Maldonado explains how to bet them heading into Week 7.

title: MLS Power Rankings: Philly wins Shield, red-hot LAFC rolling
content: After clinching the Supporters' Shield, there can be no question who's on top of ESPN's MLS Power Rankings: the Philadelphia Union.

title: After regaining the light heavyweight belt at UFC 320, Alex Pereira should move to heavyweight
content: Now that Pereira is a champ again, the UFC should give the fans the heavyweight blockbuster they want.

title: Five position battles to watch during NBA preseason
content: With the NBA preseason under way, Eric Moody highlights the key position battles that fantasy managers need to watch closely.

title: Singapore-Based NRI, Part Of Yacht Party, Joins Zubeen Garg Death Probe
content: A Singapore-based NRI, Rup Kamal Kalita, who was present on the yacht when singer Zubeen Garg died, has joined the investigation into the death of the Assamese icon on Tuesday.

title: In A First, Passengers Can Rebook Train Tickets Without Cancellation Fee
content: Travel plans can change unexpectedly, leaving passengers with tickets they can't use. Indian Railways has introduced a new policy to make it easier for travellers to adjust their plans without losing money.

title: Officials Say 6 Died In Jaipur Hospital Fire, Families Claim Figure Is At Least 8
content: At the gates of Jaipur's SMS hospital's trauma ward, Ramakant consoles his grieving mother, Sangeeta. They had come to the hospital on the night of the fire.

title: Cough Syrup Deaths Rise In Madhya Pradesh, Opposition Makes 'Bulldozer' Demand
content: What began as a mystery illness among children in Madhya Pradesh's Chhindwara district has now turned into a full-blown public health scandal and also sparked a political slugfest.

title: Senior Haryana IPS Officer Shoots Himself At His House In Chandigarh
content: Puran Kumar, a senior Haryana IPS officer, died by suicide at his Sector 11 Chandigarh residence by shooting himself, said officials.

title: Opinion: Opinion | 'Pasni' Offer Proves Pak Can Betray Anyone - Even China - For A Deal
content: China has consistently supported Pakistan - diplomatically, economically, and militarily - even during Islamabad's periods of isolation. Yet, despite this "iron brotherhood", Pakistan's recent moves show that loyalty in Islamabad is negotiable.

title: Telangana Minister Compares Colleague With "Buffalo", Sparks Row In Congress
content: The Telangana Cabinet saw internal unrest as Backward Classes Welfare Minister Ponnam Prabhakar allegedly referred to his Scheduled Caste Welfare colleague Adluri Laxman as a "buffalo" who "has no value for life".

title: The Political Power Of 'Machhli', 'Makhana', 'Paan' In Bihar
content: In Bihar, elections are not just about speeches, rallies, or slogans. They are also about things that are part of people's daily lives - machhli (fish), makhana (fox nut), and paan (betel leaf).

title: Mamata Banerjee's 'Courtesy' Visit To Injured MP, BJP's 'No Arrest' Question
content: Countering BJP's criticism over the West Bengal government holding a Durga Puja carnival in Kolkata after north Bengal was devastated by landslides, Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee has explained why the event could not be cancelled

title: Delhi Baba Horror: Woman Says She's On Her Period, Aide Slams "Excuses"
content: As the investigation deepens into the sexual assault allegations against self-styled godman Chaitanyananda Saraswati, NDTV has accessed call recordings that point to how Chaitanyananda's women accomplices summoned targets

title: Bright Idea, Dark Reality: Madhya Pradesh Anganwadis Get LED TVs, But No Electricity
content: In Madhya Pradesh's Umaria district, officials distributed shiny new LED TVs and water filters to 116 Anganwadi centres as part of the 'Saksham Anganwadi' modernisation drive. The catch? Not one of these centres has an electricity connection.

title: NDA To Finalise Bihar Seats Soon, Talks On With Chirag Paswan
content: The contentious matter of seat-sharing within the NDA alliance for the assembly polls in Bihar is expected to be finalised within the next two to three days, sources have told NDTV. The announcement is likely to be made in Patna, sources said.

title: Severe Obesity Causes Lungs To Age Prematurely: Study
content: New Delhi, Oct 7 (IANS) People with severe obesity are likely to have their lungs age faster, according to an animal study.

title: 13,000, Including PhDs, Compete for 1 Constable Post In Madhya Pradesh
content: The khaki uniform has widely been considered a symbol of pride. But in Madhya Pradesh, it has now become a symbol of survival. After years of waiting, the recruitment for police constables has finally been announced, drawing a huge response.

title: Homecoming: The Chhath Puja And The Dilemma Of Bihari Diaspora
content: As Chhath approaches, the looming shadow of the Bihar assembly elections scheduled for November 6 and 11 adds a bittersweet note to their celebrations.

title: 3 Scientists Get Nobel Prize In Physics For Work In Quantum Mechanics
content: Scientists John Clarke, Michel Devoret and John Martinis won the 2025 Nobel Prize in Physics for "the discovery of macroscopic quantum mechanical tunnelling and energy quantisation in an electric circuit", the award-giving body said on Tuesday.

title: When Jane Goodall Wanted To Send Trump, Musk, Putin Off Earth
content: In her last Netflix interview, Jane Goodall revealed she would like to send Trump, Musk, and Putin on a one-way space journey.

title: Who Is Rakesh Kishore, The Lawyer Who Threw Shoe At Chief Justice In Supreme Court
content: Advocate Rakesh Kishore was suspended by the Bar Council of India on Monday after he threw his shoe at Chief Justice BR Gavai inside the Supreme Court.

title: Chief Justice's Dig At Social Media "Reporting", Day After Shoe Incident
content: Chief Justice of India BR Gavai's remarks came a day after a lawyer attempted to throw a shoe towards him in his courtroom in the Supreme Court.

title: "Heard Rocks Striking Our House": Survivor Recounts Darjeeling Horror
content: A community hall is a shelter to over 20 families from Darjeeling's Soureni village which was struck by devastating landslides and floods two days ago.

title: 'There's nothing serious': Mamata on condition of injured BJP MP Khagen Murmu - watch
content: West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee visited BJP MP Khagen Murmu in a Siliguri hospital after he was attacked in Nagarkata. Murmu was assaulted while visiting flood-hit areas. The incident has triggered a political dispute, with the BJP blaming the TMC and the ruling party accusing the BJP of seeking publicity.

title: Haryana IPS officer dies by suicide; no note, police scramble for answers
content: Senior Haryana IPS officer Y Puran Kumar, ADGP, reportedly died by suicide at his official residence in Chandigarh. The incident occurred at his government accommodation, with police cordoning off the area and recovering the weapon. Kumar was recently transferred to Sunaria Jail, which houses Gurmeet Ram Rahim Singh.

title: PM to inaugurate Navi Mum Airport on Wed- all you need to know about Rs 19cr project
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is set to inaugurate Phase 1 of the Navi Mumbai International Airport on Wednesday. This massive Rs 19,650 crore project, India's largest Greenfield airport, aims to ease congestion at Mumbai's existing airport.

title: Perplexity’s AI browser: CEO says Comet can replace employees; helps with financial gains
content: Perplexity AI's CEO, Aravind Srinivas, claims their new AI browser, Comet, can significantly boost productivity, potentially eliminating the need for new hires.  This AI-powered tool acts as a personal assistant, enabling users to complete more tasks in the same timeframe. Srinivas estimates productivity gains could be worth $10,000 annually per person, with a potential $5 trillion GDP growth impact.

title: Tempers flare! Prithvi loses cool, swings bat at Musheer - Watch
content: Prithvi Shaw's magnificent 181 in a warm-up match against his former team Mumbai ended in controversy after he was involved in a heated altercation with bowler Musheer Khan and teammate Siddhesh Lad. Shaw's century, alongside Arshin Kulkarni's 186, showcased a strong batting resurgence for the opener.

title: Downpour in Delhi-NCR: Heavy rain lashes national capital; flight operations impacted
content: Flight operations at Delhi Airport may be impacted due to inclement weather conditions, including heavy rain and thunderstorms on Tuesday. The airport authority advised passengers to check with airlines for updates and consider alternative transport like the Delhi Metro. The India Meteorological Department issued yellow and orange alerts for the region.

title: Nobel Physics Prize for beginners: How 3 physicists built the real 'quantum world'
content: The 2025 Nobel Prize in Physics was handed out to people for pulling off what Marvel writers only pretend to understand: showing that quantum weirdness isn’t confined to subatomic particles. They built real-world circuits that behave like quantum beings — tunnelling through barriers, jumping between energy levels, and proving that Schrödinger’s cat may not be alive or dead, but quantum physics is alive and kicking.

title: Microsoft names new CEO: Nadella steps back from daily ops; commerce gets chief
content: Microsoft has promoted Judson Althoff to CEO of its commercial business, a significant move allowing CEO Satya Nadella to focus solely on AI innovation and technical development. This reorganization unifies sales, marketing, and operations under Althoff, aiming to bolster Microsoft's position in the competitive AI landscape and drive future growth.

title: Former PM HD Deve Gowda admitted to Bengaluru hospital due to infection
content: Former Prime Minister and Rajya Sabha MP H.D. Deve Gowda has been admitted to Manipal Hospital in Bengaluru following an infection. The 92-year-old Janata Dal (Secular) leader developed a fever, and a team of medical experts is closely monitoring his condition. Family sources confirmed his hospitaliSation, with further details anticipated.

title: From Gmail to Zoho: Email switch made easy; guide for effortless migration
content: Zoho Mail is emerging as a popular privacy-focused alternative to Gmail, especially for professionals and small businesses. The service offers custom domain support, an ad-free interface, and enhanced privacy. This guide outlines a simple process to migrate your emails, folders, and contacts from Gmail to Zoho Mail, ensuring no data loss.

title: Tiwary’s bombshell: Gambhir behind exit of India greats — 'He made sure they’re gone'
content: Former cricketer Manoj Tiwary has criticized coach Gautam Gambhir, alleging he created an environment that led to the retirements of Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, and R Ashwin. Tiwary believes Gambhir's coaching style has caused controversies and negatively impacted Indian cricket, questioning the exclusion of senior players.

title: BJP says another leader 'attacked' in West Bengal during flood-relief drive; TMC terms it 'baseless'
content: BJP MLA Manoj Kumar Oraon was allegedly attacked by TMC workers in Alipurduar while distributing flood relief, a day after two senior BJP leaders were assaulted in Jalpaiguri. The TMC denied the allegations, claiming Oraon assaulted an elderly man first. Prime Minister Modi condemned the attacks, criticizing the TMC's insensitivity and the state's law and order.

title: The veteran, the challenger, the disruptor: Nitish faces rough poll pitch; RJD, PK loom large
content: The INDIA bloc faces an uphill battle in Bihar, aiming to regain national momentum after recent BJP victories. Despite opposition efforts and a statewide campaign, the BJP-JD(U) combine leverages incumbency and caste engineering. The opposition hopes to capitalize on discontent among Muslim voters and doubts about Nitish Kumar's leadership.

title: Shocking! Dhoni to move away from CSK? Viral photo causes meltdown
content: MS Dhoni surprised fans by appearing in a Mumbai Indians jersey during a football match, a stark contrast to his Chennai Super Kings legacy. This unexpected sight follows his recent heartwarming interaction with Kapil Dev and Rohit Sharma at an event. The images have sparked considerable social media discussion, leaving many wondering about the veteran's future.

title: Taylor Swift’s 2008 post about Keri Russell goes viral again
content: Keri Russell was delighted on The Tonight Show when Jimmy Fallon revealed Taylor Swift's 2008 MySpace bio calling her the "coolest celebrity ever." Russell recalled Swift's kindness from their early meeting, a heartwarming moment amidst Swift's current global fame with Travis Kelce. The interview also touched on Russell's hit show, The Diplomat, and its upcoming season.

title: Pakistan's economic recovery a myth? Millions still struggle in poverty
content: Pakistan's economic recovery is not reaching its people. Millions face poverty and inequality despite government claims of growth. Household well-being has worsened. Rural areas suffer more. Employment remains a challenge. Reforms have stabilized the economy but not improved living standards. True progress means better lives for ordinary citizens.

title: UGC approves 101 universities for online learning: Full list out; apply by Oct 15
content: The UGC has officially recognized 101 universities and 20 Category-1 institutions for Open and Distance Learning (ODL) and 113 for online courses for the 2025-26 academic year. Most universities no longer require AICTE approval for specific ODL/online programs, expanding access to higher education with a strict admission deadline of October 15, 2025.

title: Why Prashant Kishor's poll debut could upset old equations in Bihar
content: Poll strategist Prashant Kishor, now leading Jan Suraaj, is challenging Bihar's established political players, including RJD and NDA. He targets their role in the state's backwardness, aiming to appeal to unemployed youth. Kishor faces the challenge of appearing viable in a bipolar contest and needs winnable candidates to avoid being a spoiler.

title: October 9 or 10: When is Karwa Chauth? Check date, muhurat and more
content: Married Hindu women will observe Karwa Chauth on Friday, October 10, 2025, with a strict fast from sunrise to moonrise. This tradition symbolizes love and devotion, seeking long life and prosperity for their husbands. The day involves specific rituals, including prayers and breaking the fast after moon sighting.

title: Nobel Prize in Physics: Trio win award for discoveries in quantum mechanical tunnelling - details
content: John Clarke, Michel Devoret, and John Martinis have won the 2025 Nobel Prize in Physics for demonstrating macroscopic quantum mechanical tunnelling and energy quantisation in an electric circuit. Their experiments revealed quantum physics on a scale large enough to be held, proving quantum effects are not limited to the subatomic level.

title: Ranji Trophy: Shaw sends strong message to selectors; slams big hundred vs Mumbai
content: Discarded India opener Prithvi Shaw has made a strong comeback statement ahead of the 2025-26 domestic season. Shaw smashed a brilliant 186 against his former team Mumbai in a warm-up fixture, showcasing his aggressive batting prowess. This impressive performance on a good batting surface signals his intent to reclaim a spot in national contention.

title: Taylor Swift reveals why she turned down Super Bowl halftime show
content: Taylor Swift clarified her absence from the Super Bowl halftime show, stating it wasn't due to Travis Kelce but her intense focus on his games. She explained that her emotional investment in watching Kelce play makes her unable to consider her own performance during those moments. Swift also addressed rumors about Selena Gomez's wedding, highlighting their enduring friendship.

title: Nissan unveils Tekton SUV design: Upcoming Hyundai Creta rival!
content: Nissan has unveiled the design of its upcoming C-segment SUV, the Tekton, set to launch in India by mid-2026. Built on the CMF-B platform and manufactured locally, the futuristic-looking Tekton will compete with established players like the Hyundai Creta and Kia Seltos, playing a crucial role in Nissan's India strategy.

title: Stephen Curry’s cryptic post after Ayesha’s confession sparks brutal trolls
content: Stephen Curry is facing backlash online after posting an inspirational message, with fans criticizing his wife, Ayesha Curry, for recent comments about her life plans. Ayesha Curry's remarks on the 'Call Her Daddy' podcast, where she expressed not wanting marriage or children, have ignited a debate. Neither Stephen nor Ayesha has publicly addressed the ongoing criticism.

title: October 7 attack: Israel-Hamas war completes 2 years – a timeline
content: Two years after Hamas's brutal October 7th assault, Israel and Hamas remain locked in a devastating conflict. Despite ongoing peace talks in Egypt, the humanitarian crisis in Gaza deepens, while Israelis mourn their dead and demand the return of hostages. The war has seen widespread destruction, significant casualties on both sides, and international scrutiny.

title: Infra boost for nation! Cabinet clears 4 railway projects worth Rs 24,634 cr
content: The Union Cabinet has greenlit four crucial railway projects totaling Rs 24,634 crore, set to boost infrastructure across Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Gujarat, and Chhattisgarh. These initiatives will add approximately 894 km of track, enhancing connectivity for millions and improving freight movement for vital commodities. The projects aim to streamline operations and reduce congestion on key corridors.

title: 'CM face for RJD': Congress not in favour of Tejashwi? Big remark by party
content: Congress leader Udit Raj stated that Tejashwi Yadav is not the INDIA bloc's chief ministerial face, with the decision to be made collectively. This comes after Yadav expressed confidence in the Mahagathbandhan forming the government and becoming CM, promising to address unemployment. He also criticized Bihar CM Nitish Kumar's tenure.

title: 'We’ll give you a ride': ICE officials cuff and wheel protester away on cart – Watch
content: ICE posted a video showing a protester being wheeled away on a cart after refusing to walk, set to the song "Ridin'." This occurred amidst heightened tensions in Portland, where President Trump's deployment of National Guard troops to protect ICE was blocked by a federal court order.

title: TCS, Amazon, others cut layers: Middle managers at risk; red flags to watch out for
content: TCS, Amazon, Google, and others are streamlining operations by cutting mid-level management roles, aiming for faster decisions and lower costs. As AI automates coordination and reporting, traditional supervisory jobs face extinction. Experts warn managers to watch for restructuring signals and upskill in data, finance, and communication to stay relevant in the leaner, tech-driven workplace.

title: 'Tendulkar', 'Dhoni', 'Sidhu' pay tribute to Rohit Sharma's ODI captaincy - watch video
content: Mimicry artist Shaarang Shringarpure paid tribute to Rohit Sharma's ODI captaincy following his removal, using the voices and style of Sachin Tendulkar, MS Dhoni, Ravi Shastri and Navjot Singh Sidhu. Shubman Gill will now lead the India ODI side, with Suryakumar Yadav captaining T20Is, as selectors focus on the 2027 World Cup. Rohit's tenure saw a 76% win rate and two ICC white-ball finals.

title: Bihar polls: How Rahul Gandhi tuned Congress’s pitch — but will it influence voters?
content: Congress's Voter Adhikar Yatra, aimed at protesting electoral roll revisions, gained traction and boosted the party's profile, even upstaging its ally RJD. Despite the exercise leading to deletions, the subdued opposition response suggests limited impact, while the focus on the Yatra potentially allowed Nitish Kumar to address other issues.

title: TVK chief Vijay speaks to Karur stampede victims’ kin via video call
content: Actor-turned-politician Vijay contacted victims' families via video call after a tragic stampede at his rally killed 41. The Supreme Court will hear a plea for a CBI probe into the incident on October 10. An NDA delegation concluded the stampede was a preventable tragedy due to administrative failure.

title: Maithili Thakur: Folk singer once lauded by PM Modi - now set to make political debut in Bihar
content: Popular folk singer Maithili Thakur has hinted at entering politics ahead of the Bihar assembly elections, expressing a desire to contest from her hometown Benipatti. The 25-year-old artist, who recently met with BJP leaders, stated her willingness to contribute to Bihar's development and learn by interacting with people in her village.

title: 'I will not treat Muslim': UP woman alleges doctor 'refused' to treat her
content: A Muslim woman in Jaunpur alleged a doctor refused her treatment due to her religion during delivery, a claim hospital authorities deny. An inquiry is underway, while police registered an FIR against two journalists for allegedly circulating a video of the incident, sparking political debate.

title: ‘Several fake videos of mine’: Nirmala Sitharaman flags deepfake threat
content: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman highlighted the dual nature of AI, warning of its misuse for deception and fraud, citing personal experiences with deepfake videos. She emphasized the need for robust defenses as India aims to lead in AI.  Sitharaman also launched Gujarat's GIFT City foreign currency settlement system to streamline international transactions and boost investment.

title: Bird strike: Air India flight from Colombo-Chennai with 158 on board disrupted
content: An Air India flight from Colombo to Chennai encountered a bird strike upon landing. The aircraft landed safely with all 158 passengers unharmed. The return journey was cancelled as a precaution. An alternate aircraft was arranged for 137 passengers to travel to Colombo. This incident follows a similar event last month.

title: How Indian students are saying no to US
content: Student arrivals from India fell 44 percent, the sharpest fall among all major source countries. Overall international student arrivals to the US dropped 19 percent, indicating that the fall among Indians is far steeper than the global average. The downturn follows a smaller decline last year, showing a continuing trend rather than a one-time disruption.

title: UPI revolution! Facial recognition, fingerprints to soon authenticate payments: Report
content: Get ready for a payment revolution! India's UPI is set to introduce facial recognition and fingerprint authentication for transactions starting October 8th. This move, leveraging Aadhaar data, marks a significant shift from the current PIN-based system.

title: Sandalwood filmmaker Hemant Kumar arrested in sex abuse case
content: Bengaluru police arrested actor-director B.I. Hemant Kumar after a TV actress accused him of sexual harassment, cheating, and criminal intimidation. The actress alleged he pressured her for revealing scenes, spiked her drink, filmed her, and blackmailed her. He also allegedly posted uncensored film clips and defamed her, violating a court order.

title: Bengaluru late-night cab scare: Influencer alleges hostage-like ride
content: A Bengaluru influencer's terrifying Uber ride took a dark turn when the driver allegedly refused to drop her at her destination, made a U-turn, and attempted to hit her. The car's number plate also didn't match the app. The incident sparked outrage online, with Uber and Bengaluru Police investigating. The influencer opted not to file a formal complaint.

title: ‘So angry, so crazy’: Trump says Greta Thunberg should 'see a doctor'
content: US President Donald Trump labelled Greta Thunberg 'angry' and 'crazy' after her deportation from Israel. Thunberg, arrested during an aid flotilla to Gaza, spoke of a 'genocide' and betrayal of Palestinians upon her arrival in Greece. She reported harsh detention conditions, including a bedbug-infested cell.

title: 'Kantara: Chapter 1' collection: Rishab Shetty's movie gathers Rs 3.89 crore
content: Rishab Shetty's 'Kantara: Chapter 1' continues its impressive box office journey, raking in approximately Rs 3.89 crore on its eighth day. Following a strong opening weekend, the film has garnered over Rs 260 crore in India.  The prequel explores the Kadamba dynasty era and the rich folklore of coastal Karnataka, captivating audiences with its powerful narrative and visuals.

title: Draft guide: All you need to win your league this season
content: We've got everything you need to help you prepare for and execute a successful draft, all in one place.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Barcelona to move for Adeyemi
content: Borussia Dortmund forward Karim Adeyemi is on the radar of Barcelona ahead of next season. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: TGL Season 2 schedule: How to watch matches on ESPN networks
content: The tech-infused golf league, fronted by Tiger Woods and Rory McIlroy, plays its matches at SoFi Center in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida.

title: MMA divisional rankings: Pereira punches his ticket in light heavyweight top 10
content: no fewer than 13 ranked fighters in action between the UFC 320 and the PFL Champions Series . half of the light heavyweight top 10 has a new no. 1 in the wake of reclaiming the title he had lost to Magomed Ankalaev in march . there is ranking movement in six weight classes, the most notable being youssef Zalal .

title: The unraveling of Barcelona has been weeks in the making
content: defending champions laLiga have lost 4-1 to sevilla at the emirates stadium . the defeat was their worst performance under Hansi Flick, says Craig Burley . he says the defeat would have been different if he hadn't fluffed a penalty .

title: 'Let the kid play for a little bit': Assessing the hype and reality for Arch Manning
content: a third-year player has been taunted and clapped back . the quarterback has been booed by road and home fans alike . he has also brought snippets of joy to those wearing Burnt Orange .

title: WWE Crown Jewel: Key stats and info to know before Saturday's premium live event
content: the premium live event (PLE) will be headlined by a pair of matches for the men's and women's crown jewel championships . undisputed WWE champion Cody Rhodes will challenge world heavyweight champion seth Rollins in one match .

title: The best World Series matchup for every type of fan
content: there are 16 possible World Series matchups we could get later in October . a majority of fans might strongly disagree with including . there's something for everyone, from history to star power to longstanding droughts . here are eight of the most exciting possible matchup scenarios .

title: Sorting out the bowl picture after another weekend of surprises
content: two preseason college football playoff contenders lost to opponents who had disappointed . last season's inaugural 12-team CFP, the five highest-ranked conference champions will make the field . the other eight teams will meet in first-round games at the campus sites of seeds Nos. 5 through 8 .

title: Barnwell breaks down three embarrassing Week 5 letdowns
content: the Titans lost 26-23 to the 49ers on a game-deciding fourth-and-1 run . it felt like the Rams could have done whatever they wanted on offense . a limping Mac Jones 'only reliable target was Kendrick Bourne'

title: Bihar SIR: SC seeks details of 3.66 lakh names excluded from list
content: the TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide . the team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports .

title: Power Rankings, X factors and predictions for all 32 NHL teams
content: the opening night of the 2025-26 NHL season is Tuesday . this preview will serve you all the key intel you need on all 32 teams, including strengths, weaknesses, X factors, most likely award winners, fantasy tips and a bold prediction .

title: Madrid: 3 injured, 5 missing in building collapse; rescue operations on
content: seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sift through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock . we strive to keep you informed about the ever-evolving world, delivering a nuanced understanding of international affairs to our readers . join us on a journey across continents as we unravel the stories that shape our interconnected world .

title: Lawrence, Mahomes have big rushing performances
content: the Jacksonville Jaguars beat the Kansas City Chiefs 31-28 at EverBank Stadium . quarterback Trevor Lawrence completed 18 of 25 passes for 221 yards and a touchdown . the last-second victory over the Chiefs snapped an eight-game losing streak in the series .

title: PM Modi dials Putin to extend birthday wishes, says looking forward to hosting him in India
content: the TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide . the team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports .

title: UFC 320 fight grades: A really good main card saves an otherwise mediocre slate
content: pereira's first-round knockout over Magomed Ankalaev was a tale of two fight cards . the main card featured a sure-to-be banger between Khalil Rountree Jr. and Ji Procházka .

title: Kerala High Court tells actor Dulquer Salmaan to approach adjudicating authority under Customs Act to get his SUV released
content: The actor’s Land Rover Defender had been seized from his house in Kochi as part of Operation Numkhor — a crackdown on celebrities who reportedly purchased high-end used cars/SUVs from Bhutan using forged documents.

title: Scheduled Tribes quota should be doubled to make way for inclusion of Kurubas, says Karnataka Chief Minister
content: Chief Minister Siddaramaiah said that the reservation percentage for Scheduled Tribes should be at least doubled from the present 7% to include the Kuruba community in the ST list in Karnataka

title: CPI(M) seeks judicial probe into spurious liquor racket under political patronage in Andhra Pradesh
content: Party stages protest at Ibrahimpatnam, flags severe drinking water crisis in Kondapalli and nearby villages

title: Andhra Pradesh government constitutes committee to redress grievances of Uppada fishermen
content: It will examine the grievances, coordinate with the relevant departments and agencies, and ensure relief, equitable compensation, and sustainable livelihood opportunities for the affected families

title: PM Modi greets Russia’s President Putin on his birthday, reaffirms commitment to India-Russia ties
content: The two leaders reviewed the progress in bilateral agenda, and reaffirmed their commitment to further deepen the Special and Privileged Strategic Partnership between India and Russia

title: BJP MLA Manoj Oraon attacked while distributing flood relief materials in North Bengal
content: A group of TMC workers attacked me and my supporters when we were distributing relief items among flood-affected villagers in Kumargram, said BJP MLA Manoj Kumar Oraon

title: Asia’s carbon capture push may jeopardise global climate goals
content: New report warns that reliance on CCS could add 25 billion tonnes of emissions and lock the region into fossil fuel pathways

title: Madras High Court transfers Kancheepuram judge Chemmal to Ariyalur Lok Adalat following allegations of abuse of power
content: He had been facing flak in recent times for alleged abuse of power and had come to adverse notice after a suo motu order remanding a DSP in judicial custody

title: Here are the big stories from Karnataka today
content: Welcome to the Karnataka Today newsletter, your guide from The Hindu on the major news stories to follow today. Curated and written by Nalme Nachiyar.

title: Telangana eyes leadership in digital agriculture
content: Pursuing vision to make agriculture more profitable with AI, IoT, advanced data systems: IT Minister Sridhar Babu told Germany’s Fraunhofer Heinrich Hertz Institute representatives

title: Karur stampede: Advocate files plea urging Madras High Court to recall order constituting SIT
content: The lawyer belonging to Congress party claimed the order had been obtained by playing a fraud upon the court and that the writ petitioner was a fictitious person

title: Gang running online investment scam busted in Bengaluru after fraudsters cheat their own employee
content: A series of raids were carried out after the gang cheated one of its own employees, who walked out of the ring and alerted the police.

title: Former Prime Minister H.D. Deve Gowda hospitalised in Bengaluru with infection; condition stable
content: The JD(S) patriarch is being treated in the Intensive Care Unit (ICU) after he developed a high fever with chills due to urinary tract infection (UTI).

title: Raebareli lynching is a crime against the Constitution, Dalits, and humanity: Mallikarjun Kharge, Rahul Gandhi in joint statement
content: Mob lynching, ‘bulldozer injustice’, and mobocracy had become a ‘horrifying hallmark of our times’, the Leaders of the Opposition in the Rajya Sabha and Lok Sabha said

title: Heavy rain lashes Delhi, IMD issues yellow, orange alerts over various regions
content: Moderate thunderstorms with lightning, hail, and wind speeds ranging between 40–60 kmph are likely over parts of central, southwest, west, northwest and north Delhi, said the weather department

title: Senior Haryana police officer found dead in Chandigarh house
content: Senior police officer Y. Puran Kumar was earlier posted as Rohtak Range IG and had recently been transferred as IG, PTC, Sunaria

title: Tamil Nadu records 3,170 elephants in latest synchronised survey
content: The estimation exercise was carried out across 26 forest divisions. Together, the Nilgiri and Coimbatore reserves support nearly 70–80% of Tamil Nadu’s wild elephants.

title: Bengaluru student killed after being run over by train near Banaswadi Railway Station
content: The point where the 22-year-old student was trying to cross the tracks had a steep curve and was covered by bushes. Police also suspect that he was wearing earphones and failed to hear the sound of the train.

title: Released over ₹1,290 crore to Bengal under flood management: Centre counters Mamata’s ‘discrimination’ charge
content: The Centre provides no funds for flood management and has even halted the Ganga Action Plan for cleaning the river, said Mamata Banerjee

title: Youth, his friends arrested for kidnapping sexagenarian neighbour for gold bars in Cuddalore
content: When the gang kidnapped a sexagenarian, the key accused went to the former’s house and convinced his son to hand over the gold bars as ransom to the gang to rescue his father.

title: Cleanliness drive taken up at Kalaburagi Railway Station under Swachhata Pakhwada
content: During the third and fourth days of the fortnight-long campaign, observed on October 3 and 4, intensive cleaning activities were carried out under the theme “Swachh Stations”.

title: Ramesh Katti files nomination for Belagavi District Central Cooperative Bank director’s post
content: No permanent enemies in politics or cooperation, says Mr. Katti. He had to resign from the chairmanship of the century-old institution last year, following a no-confidence motion by a few directors of the bank.

title: India-U.S. in continuous dialogue for trade pact: Piyush Goyal
content: "You all know, the U.S. government is currently in shutdown mode. So, keeping that in mind, we'll have to see how, where, and when the discussions can take place," he said in Doha

title: Union Cabinet approves four railway projects covering 18 Districts in four States
content: The projects will increase the existing network of Indian Railways by about 894 km and help in providing seamless connectivity for the movement of people, goods and services, an official statement said.

title: Rupee settles 4 paise lower at 88.78 against U.S. dollar
content: Rupee opened with a marginal gain at 88.72 against the U.S. dollar and touched the intra-day low of 88.79 and a high of 88.79 before ending the session at 88.78 (provisional)

title: Kerala govt. urges Centre to consider amendments to caste certificate rules for linguistic minorities
content: Naduvattom Gopalakrishnan committee report has recommended that the time limit for issuing caste certificates be raised from before 1950 to include those who settled in Kerala before January 1, 1970.

title: File report on threat perception to Unnao rape victim's mother: Supreme Court to Delhi Govt
content: The mother has sought recall of the Supreme Court's March 25 order which removed CRPF security cover given to her family and other witnesses

title: Tamil Nadu aims to attract investments worth ₹75,000 crore by 2032: CM Stalin
content: Mr. Stalin was speaking during the inauguration of the three-day AeroDefCon’25 at Chennai Trade Centre

title: World Bank ups FY26 growth outlook to 6.5% on but downgrades next year’s forecast due to Trump tariffs
content: The World Bank also cautioned that 50% tariffs on Indian shipments imposed by the U.S. will have implications on the country in the coming year.

title: Stock markets advance for fourth day on buying in HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank
content: The 30-share BSE Sensex rose by 136.63 points or 0.17% to settle at 81,926.75 after a see-saw trade. During the day, it jumped 519.44 points or 0.63% to 82,309.56; the 50-share NSE Nifty climbed 30.65 points or 0.12% to 25,108.30

title: Air India plane crash probe: No manipulation or dirty business happening in  probe, says Aviation Minister
content: Naidu’s assertion comes against the backdrop of concerns expressed in certain quarters about the Aircraft Accident Investigation Bureau probe into the fatal crash

title: Kerala Assembly passes Bill for unified law on societies amid Opposition ruckus over Sabarimala row
content: Minister Kadannapally Ramachandran describes Kerala Societies Registration Bill as ‘an important, timely and a historic step’ in matters related to State’s Registration department

title: Zubeen Garg’s wife, sister seek to know circumstances leading to his death in Singapore
content: Demanding justice for deceased singer Zubeen Garg, family seeks answers and support in ongoing investigation

title: Cough-syrup deaths: Congress demands judicial probe, compensation for deceased's families
content: Congress leaders demanded a judicial inquiry into the cases of the children's deaths and a government job for a member of each of the affected families

title: Centre approves ₹707 crore for Gujarat and Assam that were affected by floods and landslip  in 2024
content: Out of the total amount of ₹707.97 crore, ₹313.69 crore has been approved for Assam and ₹394.28 crore for Gujarat

title: Ladakh tourism bodies seek financial relief to mitigate crisis after Leh unrest
content: Tourism stakeholders in Ladakh demand urgent financial intervention to prevent defaults and closures in the aftermath of recent unrest

title: Bombay High Court declines interim relief on Kunbi caste certificates for Marathas
content: Petitions challenged Maharashtra government’s move to extend OBC benefits to Maratha community members.

title: Energy minister K.J. George defends Sharavathi Pumped Storage Project
content: Mr. George said energy requirement would reach its peak between 6 p.m. to 10 p.m. and 6 a.m to 8 a.m., and the Sharavathi PSP, proposed to generate 2,000 MW, would help meet the demand.

title: Oral cholera vaccine Shanchol gets WHO prequalification
content: Comes on heels of GCBC Vaccines, a part of Gland Family Office, acquiring two facilities from Sanofi in April 2024 and resuming manufacturing of the vaccine originally developed by Shantha Biotechnics

title: Curfew relaxed in Cuttack; restrictions still in place
content: The administration has suspended internet services for 48 hours till 7 p.m. on October 7 to prevent “anti-social elements” from misusing the facility to spread rumours and disturb communal harmony

title: India sourced military hardware worth ₹1.20 lakh crore in 2024-25: Rajnath
content: Rajnath Singh also listed goals in the defence sector to realise India’s overall aim to become a developed country by 2047

title: Satellite communications, defence electronics firm Avantel opens ₹56 cr facility in Hyderabad
content: Focus of the new, 76,000 sq ft facility will be on design, development and manufacturing of software-defined radios, radar systems and satellite integration

title: Kerala CM chairs meeting on Argentina football team playing in Kochi
content: Meet lays out roadmap for refurbishing Jawaharlal Nehru International Stadium to international standards for match in November

title: Women’s body seeks action over inclusion of rapper Vedan’s song in syllabi of Calicut, Kerala universities
content: Kozhikode-based Council for Women’s Rights and Safety has approached Kerala Governor, who is Chancellor of State universities, seeking ‘appropriate action’ by V-Cs of the two universities over inclusion of song by Vedan who faces rape allegations

title: Bigg Boss Kannada 12 gets closure notice from KSPCB for violation of environmental norms
content: The KSPCB order said M/s. Vels Studio and Entertainment Limited, the amusement park where the reality show is being shot, was operating without obtaining valid consent from the Board which falls under Green Category.

title: AIADMK leader Palaniswami deplores ‘blocking’ of Tamil news channel’s telecast on Arasu cable network
content: In a post on social media, Mr. Palaniswami also referred to reports that the telecast of Puthiya Thalaimurai had been restored in some districts after having been suspended fully.

title: AstraZeneca gets regulator’s nod to market cancer drug in India
content: Trastuzumab Deruxtecan is already approved in India for the treatment of metastatic breast cancer and locally advanced or metastatic gastric cancer

title: Congress demands Centre to declare North Bengal devastation as national disaster
content: State Congress president Subhankar Sarkar said an all-party meeting should be called by the West Bengal Government in this regard

title: Terror funding case: Supreme Court denies bail to NSCN-IM leader Alemla Jamir
content: The National Investigation Agency lodged a case against Alemla Jamir after she was intercepted at the Delhi airport on December 17, 2019, before she could fly to Dimapur with about ₹72 in cash

title: Supreme Court refers issue of career stagnation of judicial officers to 5-Judge Constitution Bench
content: Supreme Court refers career stagnation of lower judicial officers to Constitution Bench amid divergent views on promotion avenues

title: Supreme Court hints at acquittal for Nithari convict Surendra Koli in last pending case
content: While reserving its verdict on Mr. Koli’s curative petition, the Supreme Court remarked that it “deserves to be allowed in a minute”

title: Karur stampede: TVK chief Vijay speaks to victims’ families on video calls
content: A core team of TVK functionaries has been facilitating the interactions through video calls, connecting Mr. Vijay. The cadres have requested the families not to record or photograph the calls.

title: Major Highways, roads closed owing to heavy rain, snowfall in Jammu & Kashmir
content: The high-altitude areas of Jammu and Kashmir experienced fresh snowfall, while the plains were lashed by heavy overnight rain, resulting in a considerable drop in the mercury

title: Bus overturns in U.P.'s Bahraich, 22 pilgrims injured
content: Bus carrying pilgrims overturns on Lakhimpur-Bahraich road, injuring 22 passengers; CM Yogi Adityanath directs relief operations

title: Mayawati slams SP, Congress for ‘hypocrisy’ in remembering Kanshi Ram
content: Mayawati accuses the SP of betraying Kanshi Ram during his lifetime and attempting to weaken the BSP movement in Uttar Pradesh

title: Watch: CJI Gavai attack | How political leaders, lawyers responded
content: A 71-year-old lawyer, in a breach of courtroom decorum, tried flinging a sheaf of papers at the Chief Justice during a court proceeding, but was stopped by security personnel

title: HOD of private Bengaluru college booked for sexually harassing student
content: The accused had called the student home on the pretext of lunch with his family. He allegedly told her that she had attendance shortage and offering to help her, started touching her inappropriately.

title: Satheesan demands Minister Vasavan’s resignation, cites Kerala High Court ‘observations’ on Sabarimala gold allegations
content: Opposition Leader alleges TDB colluded with sponsor Unnikrishnan Potti to deceive Sabarimala devotees

title: 10% of officials are incompetent: Minister Ganesh Naik
content: Maharashtra Minister Ganesh Naik addresses issues at a public meeting in Thane, emphasising duty over compulsion for efficient public service

title: Supreme Court to hear plea seeking CBI probe into Karur stampede on October 10
content: The appeal filed by BJP leader Uma Anandan seeking a CBI probe into the Karur stampede was mentioned before the Chief Justice for urgent listing

title: India to introduce RBI-backed digital currency: Piyush Goyal
content: The Minister underlined that India’s digital currency will be fundamentally different from private cryptocurrencies because it will carry the full backing of the Reserve Bank of India

title: Karnataka government provided ₹13,000 crore to Kalyana Karnataka in 28 months: Ajay Singh
content: Funds released to KKRDB are being utilised to improve basic infrastructure and implement a range of welfare schemes across the backward districts in the region, he said.

title: Wild Tamil Nadu, showcasing the biodiversity of the state, to premiere in Chennai
content: Bengaluru-based Kalyan Varma, co-founder of Nature InFocus, the production house behind Wild Tamil Nadu the documentary, talks about the documentary’s genesis, creating it and how he hopes to make it the pride of the state

title: ‘Mediation for nation’ campaign settles 1,361 cases in Tamil Nadu
content: A total of 25,584 cases were referred for mediation during the campaign period between July 1 and September 30, 2025

title: BSP to hold Bahujan Sankalp Samavesha on October 9 in Kalaburagi
content: The party has decided to organise the mega event to observe the death anniversary of its founder, Kanshi Ram
